C2 approving very good, exciting, or unusual: a sensational sports car/dress She looks sensational (= extremely attractive) in her new dress.
C1 disapproving Sensational news reports and articles are intended to be shocking and exciting rather than serious: Some of the more sensational newspapers have given a lot of coverage to the scandal.
